projects.Name: agentic-voice
projects.Description: Agentic Chat App is an advanced AI-powered chat application designed for seamless real-time communication and intelligent responses. Built with Next.js, OpenAI, and Exa API, it leverages cutting-edge technologies.

projects.Name: pygentic
projects.Description: Pygentic is an innovative system designed to enhance the capabilities of AI assistants by providing a flexible and standardized API.

projects.Name: q-space
projects.Description: Q-Space, a cutting-edge deployment wizard designed to simplify the process of setting up and managing quantum computing applications using Azure Quantum and Azure Functions.

projects.Name: pipackager
projects.Description: pipackager is a tool to manage your PyPI package, including cleaning old distributions, building new ones, uploading to PyPI, version incrementing, and more.

projects.Name: ai-gist
projects.Description: This project provides a FastAPI application to create and update GitHub gists using the GitHub API. It includes SQLite for persistence and is designed to run in a GitHub Codespace.
